title: Womens Dress Cocktail V Neck
title_original: FANDEE Plus Size Midi Dress for Women - Printing Summer Dresses for Wedding Guest Cocktail Party 3/4 Sleeve V Neck（L-5XL）

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits well, with one noting it hits just below the knee, and appreciate its versatility as it can be dressed up or down. The material is thick and not see-through or flimsy, with one customer describing it as a thick stretchy polyester, and they like its vibrant colors. Customers find the dress comfortable and well-made, with one mentioning the stitching doesn't pull, and they appreciate the pockets. Regarding sizing, while some find it true to size, others report it runs too big. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit and quality!
items.body: I love it! It fit me perfectly and the style is lovely. Bought this for a bridal lunch. The stretch is great, material isn’t see through or flimsy, it’s the right thickness. It’s comfortable and I suppose this can be worn at a wedding or even a business event. Read more
items.author: Simone Bartell

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress!
items.body: It’s a beautiful dress. It is true to size. I got the 3X and it fits perfectly. The fabric has some give in it. It is perfect for work or church. I’ve bought the same dress in other fabric patterns. It is very comfortable. It’s definitely a “dressy” kind of dress, like, it can’t be worn with tennis shoes or slippers. It looks best with a shoe that has a heel. Read more
items.author: Chellevator

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely dress well crafted.
items.body: I love my dress and I am buying more. A perfect fit for my plus-size. Great workmanship. I can move it easily and breath. No tightness. Read more
items.author: Rdja

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Print Dress
items.body: The fit is rue to size as recommended; however if you are expecting a cotton blend similar to African print clothing, the dress is some polyblend. Fabric is soft and stretchy. I would call it a nice print dress but not in the African attire category. Read more
items.author: Maria Clifford

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: The dress fits perfectly and material feels good while I’m wearing it. I’ve received compliments on this dress. Read more
items.author: EC

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality
items.body: Cute red & black dress. Fits well! Read more
items.author: TX songbird mom

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely Stunning!
items.body: I absolutely love this dress! The color is vibrant, the fit is flattering, and the fabric has just the right amount of stretch. It hugs in all the right places without being too tight, and the tie at the waist adds a perfect touch of elegance. I wore this to a summer event and received so many compliments. The 3/4 sleeves and midi length make it classy and comfortable for any occasion, from weddings to cocktail parties. If you’re on the fence, go for it you, won’t regret it! Read more
items.author: E. M. Green

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits great!
items.body: I bout a size 2x and it fits great! I received so many compliments on this dress. It has pockets which I love. It was the perfect dress for the occasion. Read more
items.author: Ms. T

short_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black Geo Print, African Print White, Geo Print, Red and Black, Solid Dark Purple, Solid White, Solid Royal Blue, Red Black Gingha, Solid Orange, Rose Red, Christmas Snowflakes, African Print Sunburst, African Print Geometric Foliage, Solid Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
